#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<string>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<set>
#include<map>
#include<vector>
#include<stack>
#include<queue>
#include<algorithm>
#include<math.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<assert.h>
#include<time.h>
using namespace std;
int array[6];
int main()
{
    int i,j,s,e,d;
    vector < int > V;
    while (scanf("%d", &array[0]) != EOF)
    {
        for (i=1; i<6; ++i) scanf("%d", &array[i]);
        if (array[0] == array[3] && array[1] == array[4] && array[2] == array[5])
        {
            puts("Losing");
            continue;
        }
        if (array[0] == array[3] || array[1] == array[4] || array[2] == array[5])
        {
            puts("Winning");
            continue;
        }
        V.clear();
        for (i=0; i<3; ++i)
        {
            d = abs(array[i]-array[i+3])-1;
            if (d) V.push_back(d);
        }
        if (V.size() < 3)
        {
            puts("Winning");
            continue;
        }
        sort (V.begin(), V.end());
        if (V[0] == V[2])
        {
            puts("Losing");
            continue;
        }
        puts("Winning");
    }
    return 0;
}
